Desc.entry: Part of Sheffield Futures and Connexions Young Women's Unit and the multi-agency Sheffield Sexual Exploitation Service. Provides one-to-one support for children and young people aged 13-19 years who are involved in or at risk of sexual exploitation. Offers training and advice to other professionals and agencies. Referrals via Sheffield Safeguarding Children Board.

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - WELFARE AND SOCIAL INCLUSION
